name: Chair Racing Simulator
description:
Chair Racing Simulator

Controls:

move: arrows, W-A-S-D

Sit/stand: E/left mouse

Choose one of 10 different characters, buckle up on one of 4 desk chairs and race over 1 to 10 rounds against the time across the first available track: Marvin's Home!

Set up and beat your own records but keep an eye on your depleting energy and collect energy drinks to refill it! ⚡

This game is a submission to the #WastedResources game jam and will be updated with more tracks and race modes in the future - including a browser and Linux version!

Assets used:

- Omega Modern graphics pack by @finalbossblues

- Title track "Start Your Engine" by Dark Fantasy Studio

- other Tracks "Connected" & "Go" by @ben_burnes

Enjoy and leave a comment below! 😉👍
